name: UPaperRuntimeSettings
doc: Implements the settings for the Paper2D plugin.

bEnableSpriteAtlasGroups: Enables experimental *incomplete and unsupported* texture atlas groups that sprites can be assigned to
bEnableTerrainSplineEditing: Enables experimental *incomplete and unsupported* 2D terrain spline editing. Note: You need to restart the editor when enabling this setting for the change to fully take effect.
bResizeSpriteDataToMatchTextures: Enables automatic resizing of various sprite data that is authored in texture space if the source texture gets resized (sockets, the pivot, render and collision geometry, etc...)
